channel.title: Another old server that i had a couple years ago (2007-2008) DELTA
channel.description:
[b]Features (some of thems):[/b]
All the correct weapon emotes + wielding recomendations status hammer does hit like a hammer (emote) but is 2 haned made for overuse. I fixed duping by using a timer on trades. walking lumbridge guide at the corner of the edgeville wilderness to tell the change in the pking rules(new pk rules or whatever) a special moster killing zone. with green dragons , mages ,... (see picture)(adding soon) FULL working magic (lunar,ancients,normal spellbook) Realistic shop prices (junk - cheap . usefulle items - expensive. fight pits work fully (not my work) assult work fully (not my work) pest control work fully (50% my work i addet all npcs + aggressive) The following skills work for attack, strength , defence, prayer, magic. runcrafting can be traind for 100% agilty´i would say 80% theiving , fletching and crafting 100% farming (not like rs way just use seeds on ditch and u get herbs) it trains . but because its not like real rs 50 % cooking , fishing , mining , fletching,farming ,firemaking,smithing,herblore 99% works fully to train 99.allot guides how to train ingame. slayer 100% working tasks and stuff (like in the most rsp servers) I have added a skilling zone smithing/mining ---> see picture. I have added banks to skilling zones, skilling shops and much more
[b]Pictures[/b] [IMG]http://i38.tinypic.com/23ww8pg.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i34.tinypic.com/2ngevs6.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i38.tinypic.com/2r386f9.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i36.tinypic.com/1z5lohv.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i37.tinypic.com/ehd4ig.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i34.tinypic.com/2wq4ghg.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i34.tinypic.com/aahgrq.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i36.tinypic.com/auwd8z.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i36.tinypic.com/30x924x.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i36.tinypic.com/2a66mir.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i33.tinypic.com/ili1av.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i35.tinypic.com/wb7uox.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i33.tinypic.com/10moig9.jpg[/img] [b]Download Links:[/b] [b]Server:[/b] [url=http://www.mediafire.com/?miynmy2mhgy]http://www.mediafire.com/?miynmy2mhgy[/url] [b]Client:[/b] [url=http://www.mediafire.com/download.php?ddnnjemdjym]http://www.mediafire.com/download.php?ddnnjemdjym[/url] [b]100% credit to Bountyleader :)[/b]

item.title: Another old server that i had a couple years ago (2007-2008) DELTA
item.dc:creator: @gubgub12345 gubgub12345
item.description:
@gubgub12345 wrote:

You know how to code, but not how to spell? The code is sloppy and many of the npc’s have major spelling mistakes. Other then that it looks decent.

Read full topic

item.title: Another old server that i had a couple years ago (2007-2008) DELTA
item.dc:creator: @youridudock youridudock
item.description:
@youridudock wrote:

longkilla888:

This is actually Pk-Planet 317 originally owned by bashar, its got quite a few customs. and actually all the custom santa and masks and phats and d plate weild in the weapons slot, so if you download its gonna need a lot of work here is the true link https://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,419547.msg3706722.html#msg3706722

This is Combattscape. Look at the date of Pk-Planet

Combattscape date release : on: July 15, 2009, 07:33:58 AM »
Pk Planet date release : on: December 31, 2009, 02:54:09 AM »

I played Combattscape my self and I know he coded it because I saw it build up from a blank source to that one.

Read full topic

item.dc:creator: @thuglife98 thuglife98
item.description:
@thuglife98 wrote:

[quote=“youridudock, post:12, topic:445179”]Ah the good old times

Server was made by Bountyleader, it was named Combattscape. I remember playing on that server for a long time… (It was one of my first RsPs I played)

The release should be somewhere around here, let me find it.

EDIT: http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,381911.0.html

Links are dead, thanks for the reupload
Also dont claim this is yours.[/quote]

alright, i’ll put credits

item.title: Another old server that i had a couple years ago (2007-2008) DELTA
item.dc:creator: @DingDongDing DingDongDing
item.description:
@DingDongDing wrote:

[quote=“xxifish i x, post:5, topic:445179”][quote author=thuglife98 link=topic=547865.msg4017153#msg4017153 date=1339725109]

do you have permission to re-release this?

hmmm, i asked to myself and he said yes. Also, this is a very old server that i had and i gave it to my friend a while ago
[/quote]

Personally I find that very hard to believe, but eh that’s just my opinion and whoever else agrees with this.
Technically you need proof that they gave you permission; people won’t take your word for it and prepared to get trolled by lots others and if not
this thread will be closed soon.

Next time try releasing your own content? [/quote]
Its not from him i got the real owner of this on my “Budy” List on Moparscape.org/smf

Read full topic
